definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: II. [[נעם]] (perh. to be assumed as √ of foll., Ne:Marg. 10; Ar. nagama speak in a low, gentle voice, nagmah;un note, melody; Syr. n9am rugivit, ne9mto0 gentle sound, note; NH [[נְלִימָה]] melody; Sir 45:9 [[לתת נעימה]] to make music; cf. Hiph. Sir 47:9 b marg.).
